1.) readouts 2.) more proof 3.) actual recordings

@bomani_jones Survival and Uprising come after Kaya, and after (IIRC) he had become increasingly more religious.
@bomani_jones it was released after he was shot and escaped to London. I think of it more as “let’s all just calm down."
@bomani_jones honestly even the songs that Bob didn’t intend to be political are political. The second half of Exodus, all of Kaya.
@bomani_jones yeah, that would be a poor choice.

Just remember that Kirk Ferentz has total and complete job security. That’s all you need to know.

@smartfootball exactly. I could make an argument that the pressure is worse, but even then.
@smartfootball again, recruiting appeals to the insane, who are the only people who should be involved in this job.
@smartfootball and if you’re good enough — hell, even if you SEEM good enough — people will do such stupid things for you.
@DanRubenstein but seriously, Harbaugh could start demanding random goat sacrifices and someone would come up with it.
@DanRubenstein i am detecting a hint of sarcasm here.

@AceAnbender pros: uh cons: :: points at Jed York ::
Recruiting is great if you’re insane, and the perks are infinitely superior.
